Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average duration of the period during which a case remains in Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION before transitioning to any subsequent activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent across all cases in the state Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in variants where no rejections occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Payment Handled in successful variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Elapsed time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in variants that include budget owner approval versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in rejected variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION compared to the cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION compared to the cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in domestic declaration cases versus pre-paid travel cost cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION is initiated after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE, specifically in cases that later require budget owner involvement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in cases that eventually reach Payment Handled without any rejection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION across all successful variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to the final activity (Payment Handled) in the most frequent variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Request Payment in variants where supervisor and budget owner are different roles
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to the next activity, distinguishing between approvals and rejections, to identify bottlenecks in decision-making
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the next approval or rejection activity, grouped by year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'", 'end': "activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or activity == 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' or activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET_OWNER' or activity == 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET_OWNER' or activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' or activity == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' or activity == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' or activity == 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
